text: Etake yetiya tomaloke kaphirasakalara lagata yud'dhata mukabila karaa tetiya (sihamtara) gharata aghata karaiba, arasesata yetiya tomaloke sihamtaka sampurnaraupe paryudasta karaiba tetiya sihamtaka katakatiyakai bandhiba; tara pichata ha’le anukampa, naha’le muktipana. Yetiya laike (sihamte) yud'dhara bhara (astra-sastra) nama'i nathaya. E'idarae'i, arau allahe iccha karaile sihamtara paraa pratisodha laba parailehemtena, kintu te'om tomalokara ejanaka anajanara dbaraa paraiksa karaiba bicarae. Yisakale allahara pathata nihata haya te'om ketiya te'omlokara amala binasta ha’ba nidiye
